subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New members!
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Ahhh yeah I let them in before work but didnt have enough time to send a hello message or let you know they joined.
   
  Bonjour et bienvenue Gerard! Comment allez vous? Je parle un petite (un peu) francais, espagnol, creole, and my redneck english isnt half bad either. Forgive me if I dont dig out the fancy (��) letters LOL
   
  Also welcome to the other new members joining us and for those who don't know... If you want to recieve the files members are sharing you must put your group setting on individual emails so that you can recieve attachments. We share most of our files that way on a regular basis.
   
  Have fun!
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          
Welcome to Gerard.

Gerard was in a French group that I tried to join just to share information 
internationally, but I can't speak French, so I sent him a an invite for our 
group.

Welcome to the other new members as well!

Frank
